messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] being consumed by the kids
messages.msgSnippet: Ditto to everything that you guys said. My husband and I call it nursing the kids.. LOL.. yeah, they have all been weaned for years .. but its like they
messages.messageBody:
Ditto to everything that you guys said.

My husband and I call it "nursing" the kids.. LOL.. yeah, they have all been
weaned for years .. but its like they still have to "nurse".. have my
undivided attention. Sometimes I feel like a moma piggy with all her little
piglets scrambling to nurse at the same time. Its become a running joke at
our house.. " Oh, its nursing time... the kids want to nurse" LOL..

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
